title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 13, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 13, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Opentofu
items.content_text:
### Tools / CI

*   [terraform-github-actions (⭐864)](https://github.com/dflook/terraform-github-actions) - GitHub Actions for OpenTofu.
items.content_html:
Tools / CI

  • terraform-github-actions (⭐864) - GitHub Actions for OpenTofu.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Automation

*   [Kestra](https://kestra.io) - Event-driven, language-agnostic platform to create, schedule, and monitor workflows. In code. Coordinate data pipelines and tasks such as ETL and ELT. ([Source Code (⭐20k)](https://github.com/kestra-io/kestra)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker`

### Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

*   [Apprise (⭐14k)](https://github.com/caronc/apprise) - Apprise allows you to send a notification to almost all of the most popular notification services available to us today such as: Telegram, Discord, Slack, Amazon SNS, Gotify, etc. `MIT` `Python/Docker/deb`

### Software / Learning and Courses

*   [Digitools](https://ladigitale.dev/digitools) - A set of simple tools to accompany the animation of courses in person or remotely. (documentation in French). ([Demo](https://ladigitale.dev/digitools/), [Source Code](https://codeberg.org/ladigitale/digitools)) `AGPL-3.0` `PHP`
*   [INGInious](https://inginious.org/?lang=en) - Intelligent grader that allows secured and automated testing of code made by students. ([Source Code (⭐223)](https://github.com/UCL-INGI/INGInious), [Clients (⭐3)](https://github.com/UCL-INGI/INGInious-plugins)) `AGPL-3.0` `Python/Docker`

### Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

*   [Supysonic (⭐280)](https://github.com/spl0k/supysonic) - Python implementation of the Subsonic server API. `AGPL-3.0` `Python/deb`

### Software / Miscellaneous

*   [Flyimg](https://flyimg.io) - Resize and crop images on the fly. Get optimised images with MozJPEG, WebP or PNG using ImageMagick, with an efficient caching system. ([Demo](https://demo.flyimg.io), [Source Code (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/flyimg/flyimg)) `MIT` `Docker`

### Software / Software Development - Project Management

*   [Forgejo](https://forgejo.org) - A lightweight software forge focused on scaling, federation, and privacy (fork of Gitea). ([Demo](https://next.forgejo.org), [Source Code](https://codeberg.org/forgejo/forgejo/), [Clients](https://codeberg.org/forgejo-contrib/delightful-forgejo)) `MIT` `Docker/Go`
*   [Trac](https://trac.edgewall.org/) - Trac is an enhanced wiki and issue tracking system for software development projects. `BSD-3-Clause` `Python/deb`

### Software / Video Surveillance

*   [SentryShot](https://codeberg.org/SentryShot/sentryshot) - Video surveillance management system. `GPL-2.0` `Docker/Rust`
items.content_html:
Software / Automation

  • Kestra - Event-driven, language-agnostic platform to create, schedule, and monitor workflows. In code. Coordinate data pipelines and tasks such as ETL and ELT. (Source Code (⭐20k)) Apache-2.0 Docker

Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

  • Apprise (⭐14k) - Apprise allows you to send a notification to almost all of the most popular notification services available to us today such as: Telegram, Discord, Slack, Amazon SNS, Gotify, etc. MIT Python/Docker/deb

Software / Learning and Courses

  • Digitools - A set of simple tools to accompany the animation of courses in person or remotely. (documentation in French). (Demo, Source Code) AGPL-3.0 PHP
  • INGInious - Intelligent grader that allows secured and automated testing of code made by students. (Source Code (⭐223), Clients (⭐3)) AGPL-3.0 Python/Docker

Software / Media Streaming - Audio Streaming

  • Supysonic (⭐280) - Python implementation of the Subsonic server API. AGPL-3.0 Python/deb

Software / Miscellaneous

  • Flyimg - Resize and crop images on the fly. Get optimised images with MozJPEG, WebP or PNG using ImageMagick, with an efficient caching system. (Demo, Source Code (⭐1.1k)) MIT Docker

Software / Software Development - Project Management

  • Forgejo - A lightweight software forge focused on scaling, federation, and privacy (fork of Gitea). (Demo, Source Code, Clients) MIT Docker/Go
  • Trac - Trac is an enhanced wiki and issue tracking system for software development projects. BSD-3-Clause Python/deb

Software / Video Surveillance

  • SentryShot - Video surveillance management system. GPL-2.0 Docker/Rust

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Forms

*   [Qualli](https://usequalli.com) - In App Surveys, designed for mobile. Use Qualli AI to craft the perfect questions. You can try it out on our free plan, up to 500 MAU, create unlimited forms and triggers.
items.content_html:
Forms

  • Qualli - In App Surveys, designed for mobile. Use Qualli AI to craft the perfect questions. You can try it out on our free plan, up to 500 MAU, create unlimited forms and triggers.

items.title: Awesome Clojure
items.content_text:

### Debugging

*   [playback (⭐104)](https://github.com/gnl/playback)

### Exercises / YouTube

items.title: Awesome Ipfs
items.content_text:
### Apps

*   [Mintter (⭐168)](https://github.com/MintterHypermedia/mintter) - Mintter Hypermedia is an open system, built on IPFS, that allows communities to collaborate on content that is structured and deeply linked. All content in the system is cryptographically signed, versioned, and made permanent with IPFS.
*   [Quiet](https://tryquiet.org/) - Privacy focused, end-to-end encrypted chat app that runs a private IPFS network over Tor connections. Desktop and mobile iOS and Android apps available.
items.content_html:
Apps

  • Mintter (⭐168) - Mintter Hypermedia is an open system, built on IPFS, that allows communities to collaborate on content that is structured and deeply linked. All content in the system is cryptographically signed, versioned, and made permanent with IPFS.
  • Quiet - Privacy focused, end-to-end encrypted chat app that runs a private IPFS network over Tor connections. Desktop and mobile iOS and Android apps available.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### (requires Neovim 0.5)

*   [stevanmilic/nvim-lspimport (⭐73)](https://github.com/stevanmilic/nvim-lspimport) - Automatically resolves imports for undefined terms. Useful with `pyright` language server.

### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [Tsuzat/NeoSolarized.nvim (⭐194)](https://github.com/Tsuzat/NeoSolarized.nvim) - NeoSolarized colorscheme with full transparency.
items.content_html:
(requires Neovim 0.5)

  • stevanmilic/nvim-lspimport (⭐73) - Automatically resolves imports for undefined terms. Useful with pyright language server.

Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • Tsuzat/NeoSolarized.nvim (⭐194) - NeoSolarized colorscheme with full transparency.

items.title: Ai Collective Tools
items.content_text:
### Testing

*   [Keploy](https://www.keploy.io/) - A  developer-centric backend testing tool which makes backend tests with built-in-mocks faster than unit tests, from user traffic, making it easy to use, powerful, and extensible. `#opensource`
items.content_html:
Testing

  • Keploy - A developer-centric backend testing tool which makes backend tests with built-in-mocks faster than unit tests, from user traffic, making it easy to use, powerful, and extensible. #opensource
